name: My Kitchen Rules New Zealand
overview: Reality cooking show based in New Zealand

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The country’s favourite cooking show is back, pitting New Zealand’s best amateur cooking duos against each other in the ultimate cook off, all judged by MKR legends Manu Feildel and Colin Fassnidge.

episodes.name: Waikato: Neena & Belinda
episodes.overview: It's instant restaurant time. In Waikato, modern-day hippies Neena and Belinda try to impress judges Ben Bayly and Gareth Stewart and four rival teams with their best three course dinner.

episodes.name: Auckland: Sam & Dan
episodes.overview: Dan and Sam, the youngest contestants, try to impress the judges.

episodes.name: Tauranga: June & Steph
episodes.overview: June and Steph face kitchen conundrums and a lost ingredient.

episodes.name: Dunedin: Dan & Christie
episodes.overview: Newlyweds Christie and Dan work a Mexican-themed restaurant in snowy Dunedine.

episodes.name: Orewa: Tracey & Neil
episodes.overview: Tracey and Neil host the final round before elimination.

episodes.name: Palmerston: Aaron & Heather
episodes.overview: Aaron and Heather kick off group two and try to set the bar for the other competitors.

episodes.name: Lower Hutt: Ian and Sandie
episodes.overview: Ian and his wife Sandie must prove their worth after talking big last round.

episodes.name: Christchurch: Jessie and Ricki
episodes.overview: Jessie and Ricki enjoy their triumphs and work through tears and tantrums.

episodes.name: North Shore: Josh and Aaron
episodes.overview: Josh and Aaron try to cook their way into the top three to avoid the dangerous fourth spot.

episodes.name: Hawke's Bay: Kelly and Megan
episodes.overview: Sisters Kelly and Megan are under pressure to impress; the judges reveal a shocking twist.

episodes.name: Instant Restaurant: Theresa and Joelle
episodes.overview: Mothers Theresa and Joelle struggle to plate up in a chaotic kitchen.

episodes.name: Instant Restaurant: Neil and Tracey
episodes.overview: Tracey and Neil aim to improve over their previous 57 points this time.

episodes.name: Instant Restaurant: Josh and Aaron
episodes.overview: Josh and Aaron are determined to score higher than their previous 68 points.

episodes.name: Instant Restaurant: Steven and Maura
episodes.overview: Maura and Steve try to impress with their restaurant's look in addition to the food.

episodes.name: Instant Restaurant: Dai and Dal
episodes.overview: Dai and Dal create a unique Laotian-style restaurant; the judges reveal a twist.

episodes.name: Ronald McDonald House
episodes.overview: Teams split into groups to cook a healthy meal for the children of Auckland's Ronald McDonald House.

episodes.name: Rapid Cookoff
episodes.overview: Teams face their first cook-off to determine who will enter the elimination round.

episodes.name: Sudden Death
episodes.overview: Two teams face off in 90 minutes to prepare and serve an entree to 4 special guest judges.

episodes.name: Genesis International
episodes.overview: Teams must cook for 150 people in 90 minutes to avoid the elimination round.

episodes.name: Rapid Cookoff
episodes.overview: Teams have 45 minutes to cook; the bottom three teams will move onto the showdown.

episodes.name: Sudden Death
episodes.overview: The bottom 4 teams face elimination as they cook for judges Ben and Gareth and four guest judges.

episodes.name: Bikers Banquet
episodes.overview: The 6 remaining teams aim to please as they prepare lunches for the judges and eight mystery guests.

episodes.name: Rapid Cookoff
episodes.overview: As teams compete to avoid sudden death, a twist in the challenge throws them off their game.

episodes.name: Sudden Death
episodes.overview: The bottom two teams face sudden death as they cook for Ben, Gareth, and four guest judges.

episodes.name: Federal St. Pizza
episodes.overview: The top five teams compete in a people's choice pizza challenge in Auckland to avoid sudden death.

episodes.name: Rapid Cookoff
episodes.overview: The top 3 teams compete in two challenges to find out who will continue.

episodes.name: Sudden Death
episodes.overview: The bottom 2 teams compete to impress judges Ben, Gareth, and four guest judges.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 1
episodes.overview: In the first semi-final, two teams compete to advance to the Grand Final.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 2
episodes.overview: In the second semi-final, the remaining teams compete for a spot in the Grand Final.

episodes.name: Final
episodes.overview: The last two teams prepare five courses each, but only one will claim the $100,000 grand prize.

episodes.name: Auckland: Hannah and Cathy
episodes.overview: Hannah and Cathy of Auckland are first to cook.

episodes.name: New Plymouth: Laurence and Paul
episodes.overview: Laurence and Paul create a meal for the judges and the rival teams.

episodes.name: Hawkes Bay: Monique and Henry
episodes.overview: Monique and Henry create an instant restaurant in Hawkes Bay.

episodes.name: Canterbury: Cheryl and Ruth
episodes.overview: Mother and daughter team Cheryl and Ruth cook in Rangiora.

episodes.name: Macraes Flat: Travis and Jeremy
episodes.overview: Travis and Jeremy create the last Instant Restaurant of the round in Macraes Flat.

episodes.name: Hamilton: Jay and Sarah
episodes.overview: Jay and Sarah prepare a three-course dinner in Hamilton.

episodes.name: Manawatu: Lauren and Simon
episodes.overview: Lauren and Simon cook in Palmerston North.

episodes.name: Auckland: William and Zoe
episodes.overview: William and Zoe create their Instant Restaurant in Auckland.

episodes.name: Manawatu: Kimberley and Brooke
episodes.overview: Sisters Kimberley and Brooke cook at their Manawatu farm.

episodes.name: Auckland: Katrina and Natasha
episodes.overview: Katrina and Natasha prepare the last instant restaurant of group 2 in Auckland.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The teams prepare food for a charity barbecue challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Six teams compete in a rapid cook-off to determine which of them will go to sudden death.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The bottom four teams compete in a sudden death challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: The teams cook for rugby players in a People's Choice challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The teams compete in a beef and lamb cook-off to avoid a sudden death challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The bottom four teams compete in a sudden death challenge

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: The top five teams prepare a five-course dinner at Auckland's Pakuranga College.

episodes.name: Semi Final 1
episodes.overview: Two teams compete in the first semi final for a spot in the finale.

episodes.name: Semi Final 2
episodes.overview: In the second semifinal, the remaining two teams compete for the last spot in the finale.

episodes.name: Final
episodes.overview: The finalists prepare 5 courses for the judges and guests.

episodes.name: Tash & Hera - Rotorua
episodes.overview: Get ready for the ultimate dinner party! Pete and Manu are coming to dinner, they can't wait to see what the Kiwis cook up! 10 episodes, 12 contestants, and everyone's invited!

episodes.name: Jaryd & Ben - Auckland
episodes.overview: Can Childhood Buddies Jaryd and Ben pull off the ultimate meal and get to the top of the leader board? Or will their date night dessert prove to be their undoing?

episodes.name: Teal & Sophie - Wellington
episodes.overview: It's Wellington Hairdressers Teal and Sophies Instant Restaurant tonight where they will be showcasing Teal's Vietnamese heritage. Will these bold Asian flavours be to every ones liking?

episodes.name: Charlotte & Maddie - Auckland
episodes.overview: The youngest team in MKR, Auckland Students Charlotte and Maddie want to prove that even though they are young, they have what it takes to win.

episodes.name: Chris & Bex - Wanaka
episodes.overview: It's Chris and Bex's time to showcase their beloved Wanaka and all its produce. But with an ambitious menu, have they bitten off more than they can chew?

episodes.name: Heather & Mitch - Christchurch
episodes.overview: It's the final instant restaurant where Heather and Mitch attempt to knock off Teal and Sophie for the top spot and claim the advantage. At the end of tonight, one team will be eliminated.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: MKRNZ is back and so are Pete and Manu, who can't wait to taste some more delicious Kiwi food. Tonight, the competition kicks off in the seaside suburb of Papamoa with love birds, Sindy and Roger

episodes.name: Nada & Pops from Tauranga
episodes.overview: MKRNZ is back and so is Manu but sitting alongside him this time is Colin Fassnidge. Tonight the competition kicks off in the harbourside city of Tauranga with friends, Nada & Pops

episodes.name: Matt & Kurt from Mangawhai
episodes.overview: It's MKR NZ's second Instant Restaurant. Can mates Matt & Kurt pull off the ultimate 3-course dinner and claim the top spot on the leader board?

episodes.name: Anya & Emillie from Auckland
episodes.overview: It's friend team Anya & Emilie's turn to host their Instant Restaurant and showcase their French, Russian and Korean heritage. But will their culinary journey around the world be a hit or a miss?

episodes.name: Julie & Matthew from Auckland
episodes.overview: It's mother and son team, Julie & Matthew's turn to showcase their sophisticated menu. Around the dining room table, expectations for a good score are high

episodes.name: Viki & Pascal from Te Puna
episodes.overview: Te Puna married couple Vikki & Pascal are hosting the final Instant Restaurant. But will the pressure of cooking last be their downfall?

episodes.name: People's Choice Challenge: Barbeque
episodes.overview: Tonight is a people's choice challenge where teams will be cooking on BBQ's in Auckland's Viaduct. A huge twist is revealed which takes everyone by surprise

episodes.name: Glasshouse
episodes.overview: Tonight our teams will cook a 6-course degustation menu for some Kiwi celebrities, all in the name of the Nga Rangatahi Toa charity. At the end of the night another team will be going home

episodes.name: Street Feast
episodes.overview: Tonight our remaining teams take over a food hall, serving up top quality street food for the public. But it's Manu and Colin they will need to impress. At stake is a place in the Grand Final

episodes.name: Semi Final
episodes.overview: It's the semi-final where two teams compete in a sudden death cook off. Their task is to cook a 3-course dinner to impress a table of Kiwi comedians, and it's no laughing matter

episodes.name: Season Finale
episodes.overview: It's the MKR Grand Final where our last two teams go head-to-head for the $100K prize. They will both serve up a 4-course menu at two of the country's most prestigious restaurants.

episodes.name: Emily & Nathan
episodes.overview:
MKRNZ is back and so are Manu & Colin for another series of New Zealand’s favourite cooking show. The competition starts in

Auckland with siblings Emily & Nathan.

episodes.name: Lee & Luke
episodes.overview: Can Kaiapoi Mother and Son team, Lee and Luke pull off the ultimate 3 course dinner and claim the top spot on the leaderboard?

episodes.name: Jax & Manz
episodes.overview: It’s friends team Jax and Manz turn to host their Instant Restaurant and showcase their flare with some classic Kiwi cuisine. But will confidence be their downfall?

episodes.name: Piki & Michael
episodes.overview: Raglan cousins Piki & Michael are hosting their Instant Restaurant with kai from the realm of Tangaroa and Tāne. Have they got what it takes to get to the top of the leaderboard?

episodes.name: Mark & Andrea
episodes.overview: It’s dark horses Mark and Andrea’s turn to showcase their 3 course menu. Can they live up to expectations or will the pressure overwhelm them?

episodes.name: Emma & Abbie
episodes.overview: Hamilton sisters Emma and Abbie are hosting the final Instant Restaurant. They’ve talked the talk but can they walk the walk? One team will be eliminated

episodes.name: Semi-final #1
episodes.overview: It's the first semi final where two teams go head-to-head, cooking gastro-pub cuisine at Little Creatures Brewing. At the end of the night one team will be eliminated

episodes.name: Semi-final #2
episodes.overview: It’s the second semi final with two teams cooking a three course lunch for a group of formidable foodies. Who will make it to the next round and who will be going home?

episodes.name: Penultimate Challenge
episodes.overview: It’s the penultimate challenge with the three remaining teams battling it out for a place in the MKR Grand Final, catering a function at the Hyatt Park Hotel. The stakes couldn’t be higher

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The country’s favourite cooking show is back, pitting New Zealand’s best amateur cooking duos against each other in the ultimate cook off, all judged by MKR legends Manu Feildel and Colin Fassnidge.
